humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there are metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes (3/31 positive lymph nodes found in section E), which corresponds to the N2 stage according to the AJCC staging system. This is consistent with New Rule 14 and Rule 9.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic adenocarcinoma in 3 out of 31 lymph nodes in the left axillary contents, with the maximum size of metastasis being 0.4 cm and extranodal extension present, measuring 0.5 mm in maximum dimension. This corresponds to N2 stage.
